name: This Room Ain't Big Enough For The Two Of Us
name_original: This Room Ain't Big Enough For The Two Of Us
description:
Fast paced competitive cowboy construction!

You and a friend are cowboys, but the room you're just ain't big enough for the two of you. Fix this problem by chucking floors and walls around and try to trap the other player in a different room. When both cowboys are in different rooms, the one with the larger room wins!

Controls are listed in game.
